metatags.og:title: Electric scooters in flames show high cost of India's green goals
metatags.og:description: The incidents have, not surprisingly, made many Indians wary of electric vehicles — the number of people who said they wouldn’t buy an electric scooter due to safety and performance concerns jumped eightfold to 17% in the seven months through March, a survey of around 11,500 consumers conducted by LocalCircles showed.
